verses.1: Topa aw, nang kong bel hi. Kei hong zahhuaisak kei in.
verses.2: Na thumanna tawh kei hong huh inla, hong hon khia in. Keima lamah na bil hong ngat inla, hong hon in.
verses.3: Hong hon dingin ka belh suangpi, ka kulh muanhuai, hong hi ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong honpa le ka belh pa na hi hi.
verses.4: Ka Pasian aw, migiloteʼ khut sung pan le thuman lo mite le migiloteʼ matna panin keimah hong hon in.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian aw, ka neu lai a kipanin ka hong lamet, ka hong muan na hi hi, Topa aw.
verses.6: Ka suah tung a kipanin nangmah kong bel a, ka nuʼ gil sung panin hong la khia pa na hi hi. Nangmah kong phat ngitnget hi.
verses.7: Mi tampite adingin a siahil bang ka hih hangin nang pen a muanhuai, keima belh na hi hi.
verses.8: Sun thapai-in nangmah kong phat a, na minthanna ka gen tawntung hi.
verses.9: Ka teek hun ciangin kei hong lawn khia kei inla, ka tha a kiat ciangin kei hong nusia kei in.
verses.10: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka galte kihoho-in, keimah hong thahnopna thu kikumkum uh hi.
verses.11: “Pasian in amah nusia zo a, amah a hon ding kuamah om lo ahih manin, amah delhin man ni,” kici uh hi.
verses.12: Pasian aw, kei kiang panin gamla om kei in. Ka Pasian aw, keimah a huh dingin hong manlang in.
verses.13: Kei hong mawhsakte zahhuai-in bei mang uh henla, keima siat nading a zongte simmawhna le min siatna in tuamcip tahen.
verses.14: Ahih hangin keʼn, nang kong lamen dinga, nangmah kong phat semsem lai ding hi.
verses.15: Thuman tawh na hotkhiatna na nasepnate sim zawh lohin tam ahih manin sun thapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
verses.16: Topa Pasian aw, na nasep liante ka phat dinga, na thumanna bek genin ka nei ding hi.
verses.17: Pasian aw, ka khangno lai a kipanin nong thuhilh a, a lamdang na nasepnate ka gengen lai hi.
verses.18: Tua ahih ciangin Pasian aw, hong piang lai ding mite khempeuh tungah nangma hatna thu ka gen khit matengin, teekin ka sam a kang zongin kei hong nusia kei in.
verses.19: Pasian aw, na vangliatna le na thumanna in van sangpite ban to hi. Pasian aw, na lian pipi na sem khinzo hi. Nang tawh a kibang kua om ahi hiam?
verses.20: Gimna lian pipi a hong tuaksak nangmah in kei nong hingkiksak dinga, lei thukpi sung panin nong la khiato ding hi.
verses.21: Nangmah in ka min hoihna nong khangsak dinga, nong hehnemkik ding hi.
verses.22: Ka Pasian aw, na thumannate hangin kei zong harp lasakna tawh nangmah kong phat ding hi. Israel-teʼ Siangtho Pa aw, laiza lasakna tawh nangmah phatna ka sa ding hi.
verses.23: Nangmah phatna ka sak ciangin nuamin ka awng dinga, na hong hotkhiatna hangin ka lungsim khempeuh tawh nuamin ka awng ding hi.
verses.24: Keima siat nading a zongte kizahhuaisak khin a, minsia khinzo ahih manun thuman tawh na hong huhna sun thapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
